pullrequest.title: fix Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test

content.raw: In case you want one, Simbody has a comprehensive inertia validator [here](https://github.com/simbody/simbody/blob/master/SimTKcommon/Mechanics/include/SimTKcommon/internal/MassProperties.h#L526). It includes obscure requirements on the off-diagonal elements also, kindly provided by Paul Mitiguy. (`SignificantReal` is about 1e-14 in double precision; `getEps()` returns machine precision, about 1e-16.)
content.html: In case you want one, Simbody has a comprehensive inertia validator here. It includes obscure requirements on the off-diagonal elements also, kindly provided by Paul Mitiguy. (SignificantReal is about 1e-14 in double precision; getEps() returns machine precision, about 1e-16.)
